message.content: {"given_definition_quality":25,"better_definition":"to eat; to have food or a meal","sentence":"他们吃饭。","image_prompt":"A group of friendly people, sitting together at a simple wooden table, eating bowls of rice with chopsticks. Soft apocalypse animation style: slightly muted colors, gentle abstract ruins or broken walls in the far background, but the scene feels warm, hopeful, and communal. Details should remain cheerful and inviting, focusing on the act of eating together.","sentence_translation":"They are eating a meal."}
